description: Extract patterns from text using regular expressions.

input_text.info: The text to analyze with regex patterns.

pattern.info: The regular expression pattern to match. Use capture groups () to extract specific parts.

success.text_formatted: Successfully formatted {count} matches into text (length: {length} characters)

warnings.no_matches: No matches found for the given pattern.

errors.match_processing_failed: Failed to process match at index {index}: {error}
errors.match_formatting_failed: Failed to format match at index {index}: {error}
errors.text_formatting_failed: Failed to format matches as text: {error}
